For his male model, he hires Gabriel, a young waiter on whom he has developed a serious crush. While Billy is openly gay, Gabriel says that he is straight and even claims to have a girlfriend. However, as they spend more time together and grow closer, Billy becomes increasingly unsure that this is true.","poster_path":"/dUj3KciCFdOPnyavPzhYbbpIHv5.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,10749],"popularity":7.946,"release_date":"1998-07-24","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":40},{"backdrop_path":"/pEhgVz9a4cMEVf7T0cFZK6veBHY.jpg","id":40938,"title":"20 Centimeters","original_title":"20 Centímetros","overview":"Colloquially-told story of a few days in the life of Marieta, who's saving money for the last operation in her change from man to woman. She works as a prostitute in Madrid and longs for a legitimate job. Whenever she builds up her savings, her housemate and best friend Tomás finds ways to spend, lose, or cost her those funds. She meets Raúl, whom she likes and who likes her; the trouble is he also likes that part of her she wants removed. If that's not enough, she also has narcolepsy, and when she conks out, she dreams of musical-theater numbers in which she's the singing and dancing star. Are these dreams always going to be 20 centimeters out of reach?","poster_path":"/6d9Xc34sUhLbeItvJ7nBDQcKlaJ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":5.748,"release_date":"2005-06-10","video":false,"vote_average":5.1,"vote_count":28},{"backdrop_path":"/teSh1i44Bhndw02SPVQiPrG7SpW.jpg","id":681714,"title":"Lamb of God","original_title":"Cordero de Dios","overview":"North Argentina, 1961. Now thirty-year-olds, they both live abroad but they lost touch years ago. When Antonio discovers that the house he grew up in, which had been empty for a long time, is about to be sold at auction, he decides to leave and reconnects with his childhood friend. But their lives have changed a lot. Old conflicts and new revelations bring them through Europe on a truck journey.","poster_path":"/oSbT5oqxAAx6WzLbrFKJoZWG6OB.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":5.38,"release_date":"2019-09-26","video":false,"vote_average":6.1,"vote_count":26},{"backdrop_path":"/rUKBVL69thoZLUCXESm5zCyLODL.jpg","id":416480,"title":"Before the Fall","original_title":"Before the Fall","overview":"It's a classic case of opposite attraction: Handsome Ben Bennet is a gay, affluent, stylish attorney at the top of the genteel social set in southern Virginia, while Lee Darcy is a rough-hewn welder with a secret that he nightly tries to blot out with an excess of liquor.","poster_path":"/gcaeUI6vHliLiOdrfS5NYrmp6en.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18,10749],"popularity":6.139,"release_date":"2017-04-21","video":false,"vote_average":5.6,"vote_count":29},{"backdrop_path":"/xla8oSsc4TSv7Sl3CKUoRGH2475.jpg","id":285900,"title":"Speed Walking","original_title":"Kapgang","overview":"In a quirky, small town, situated in the outskirts of everything, 14-year-old Martin is getting ready for one of the most formal transitions from boy to man; the communion. It's 1976, music's in the air and hormones are blossoming. But in the midst of it all Martin's mother suddenly passes away and her tragic death trickers a series of events that not only changes Martin's life forever, but also affects everyone else in the local community. Overwhelmed with grief neither Martin's dad, nor his older brother, is capable to comfort Martin. He enters adulthood in a mixture of drunken happiness and immense sadness over the loss of his mother, and his relationship to both his friend Kim and girlfriend Kristine comes to its natural conclusion.","poster_path":"/yoSUKBXMVHHzqZztERCoVPN2FFU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"da","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":5.626,"release_date":"2014-08-28","video":false,"vote_average":6.622,"vote_count":37},{"backdrop_path":"/hDbQF1h1ncMlbu5UUW8qAA8o3gN.jpg","id":37810,"title":"Eyes Wide Open","original_title":"עיניים פקוחות","overview":"A beautifully affecting love story that has rightly earned comparisons to Brokeback Mountain, Haim Tabakman's potent yet impeccably restrained tale has won awards and accolades at film festivals the world over. Aaron, a pillar in Jerusalem's Orthodox community is respected by friends and family. However, when he hires handsome runaway student Ezri to assist with his business, sexual tensions bristle and the pair cautiously embark on a love affair. Meanwhile, a neighbouring shopkeeper persists in seeing a man of her own choosing, even though she's been promised by her father to another. As forbidden truths come to the fore, these lovers are forced to either confront or relent in the face of a centuries-old religious community, with startling results.","poster_path":"/uZZphgPC6NOgBHhOvSyYZN5g4DL.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"he","genre_ids":[10749,18],"popularity":7.343,"release_date":"2009-05-20","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":73},{"backdrop_path":"/dXVPPPBeSkfLGA5ANCeqoCcnz9K.jpg","id":87380,"title":"Absent","original_title":"Ausente","overview":"Sebastiano teaches high school gym classes and coaches swimming. He’s got a job, a girlfriend, and a pretty normal life. But as young Martin starts to infiltrate Sebastiano’s life, his world will get turned upside down. Eerie from the first frame, this Hitchcockian thriller portrays sexual obsession with terrifying realism.","poster_path":"/8ZXP5iuLRJtLz4Vd30EER46wwCh.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[18,53],"popularity":7.571,"release_date":"2011-06-19","video":false,"vote_average":5.933,"vote_count":52},{"backdrop_path":"/iwT8yeLvxoCqNdyJd5g3uJYtsOs.jpg","id":330007,"title":"In the Grayscale","original_title":"En la gama de los grises","overview":"Bruno is an architect who has a perfect life: A nice family and a good job. Anyway, Bruno has a deep sense of unease. He decides to leave his wife to be alone and have time to find him self. A business man offers him to build an iconic landmark in Santiago city. Motivated by this professional challenge, Bruno feels he can find a twist in his life by a vocational route. He start working with a young history teacher named Fer who is agile, energetic, captivating and gay. Starts between them an unexpected and intense romance. At this point he must decide his path. The biggest learning: simplicity is the best way to get up again.","poster_path":"/ru0lL2bH0tuXazNRKtyO0XddDvE.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[10749,18],"popularity":9.112,"release_date":"2015-03-06","video":false,"vote_average":6.3,"vote_count":52},{"backdrop_path":"/vCXwQxeadQg5NV39p7loyLeGpV9.jpg","id":77067,"title":"DeadHeads","original_title":"DeadHeads","overview":"Two inexplicably coherent zombies awake amidst a zombie attack and decide to take a road trip to find the one's lost love, unaware they are being chased by the agents of a ruthless company with its own agenda.","poster_path":"/uDhZDedBv9eRDkuJSTbM77EmHI1.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[12,35,27],"popularity":8.775,"release_date":"2011-04-29","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":94},{"backdrop_path":"/yjeLcYAjjNG73p5QuJgEKIOttdj.jpg","id":158848,"title":"The Falls","original_title":"The Falls","overview":"The Falls is a feature film about two missionaries that fall in love while on their mission.
